creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: necklace, main body of which is a circle made from coiled wire; coiled wire ends with a dragon head at each end; the dragons hold a wire link to a flat panel; the panel has a yin/yang symbol at center across from a cow(?) face; these symbols are surrounded by several borders of raised silver; the panel has three chains attached to the bottom; two chains have some sort of plant charm attached; the center chain has a fish
dimension: 13 1/4 x 1 1/4 x 1/2 in. (33.66 x 3.18 x 1.27 cm) (with chains dangling)
title: Necklace
